title: My chests have been available for week now and I gotten an s two times and I have yet to be awarded
body: So it has been a long while since  I have gotten a  chest. I always get them when they're available but not this week. When I go to my profile it reads that I have 4 chests available. It has been a week since I have yet to get them after receiving s's.

replies.body: Bl√≠ght provided some solid points here.  There's quite a few requirement to getting a chest per our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) crafting guide.  if this is still an issue, toss some more specific info like what champions are impacted, if they meet the requirements, and when it was played.  Happy to help clarify!

You can only unlock them on each champion once per season.

You need to play different champions to unlock more.
